column7: Introduction to the arts of theater for non-majors, including acting, design, directing, dramaturgy, and playwriting, together with a survey of theatrical history, minority theater, and plays by women. Attendance at Department of Theater productions (ticket fee required). Credit not given for both THEA 101 and THEA 102.
column9: Credit not given for both THEA 101 and THEA 102.
column27: Civello, M;Goodell, E;Miller, T;Morrissette, J;Radice, T
